notes: Fixed issue with distance checks not actually working.
Fixed issue with targeting models now works correctly.
Reversed menu layout now populates right -> left instead of left -> right so targets with one option populate the way everyones used too.
Made some adjustments to debugging functions.
Replaced old boii development branding with new throughout.
Replaced default UI styles to fall in line with other releases and boii_rp framework setup.
Fixed issue with cancelling progressbar.
Fixed issue with notification alignment not saving.
Fixed issue with notification positions not saving.
Replace notification type: information with info to save on typing.
Added in a 'disabled' option for context menu items, disabled will now be greyed out and not interactable.
Added in a 'interactable' option for context menu items, if this is false the menu option will be inactive however it will not be greyed out.
Added support for action_type = 'function' for main and sub context menu options.
Fixed issue with drop down contenxt menu options not flexing correctly on multiple clicks.
Added multiline message support for context menu input fields.
Added grid overlay to settings when positioning items and hid tablet UI so it is not in the way.
Replaced use of left & right for flex-start & flex-end respectively to fix alignment issues.
Moved all files into folders to allow for better future organisation.
Added boii dev branding back into top of files.
Added new section for handling resource cooldowns.
Fixed issue with missing callback to retrieve a singular skills data.
Updated debug logs to include name of invoking resource.
Added version check.
Replaced escrow functions handling balances / inventory modification with new utils updated functions.
Fixed issue with store balance types not being adjusted by config values.
Replaced escrow functions handling balances / inventory modification with new utils updated functions.
